title: Hypercontext (YC S21) Is Hiring a Quality Assurance Specialist
description:
We’re looking for a Quality Assurance specialist to help Hypercontext ensure we’re building the product of the future. As a Quality Assurance Specialist you are the first line of defence against issues going out to our users. You will test new features that range from small UX tweaks to large enterprise rollouts for all platforms. You are the very important grease between the wheels to keep our Product & Engineering machine running smoothly.

If you thrive in a team environment, hold yourself to high standards, and want to make a serious impact in improving the modern workplace, then Hypercontext is the place for you.

At Hypercontext, you will:
- Work with Product team to test new features before they’re released to the world
- Collaborate with Product lead to determine work prioritization based on issue severity
- As the keeper of the current state of the application, contribute to cross-collaborate teams to help resolve and troubleshoot customer issues
- Maintain a prioritized backlog of issues for the Product roadmaps
- Assist in the creation of product help documentation

Key Qualifications
- Ability to work collaboratively and explain complex ideas and concepts clearly
- Excellent problem solving, organizational skills, and critical thinking 
- The ability to look holistically at our product experiences and create innovative solutions

Nice to haves: Experience with any of the following is a plus, but not required
- Bachelor’s degree in related fields
- Experience writing bug tickets
- Experience caretaking and prioritizing a backlog in a ticket management system (JIRA, Linear, Trello, etc) 
- Experience in a small rapid growth startup environment

Why work with us? What makes Hypercontext extra special:
- Build something important with a fun, dynamic and collaborative team
- Competitive compensation
- Paid vacation that starts right away
- Epic benefits
- Remote work
- Supportive parental leave policy
- Career development and learning opportunities
